abstract.p: Lycos Europe expands its presence in Scandinavia by buying Swedish portal company Spray Network for $577 million in cash and stock; acquisition will give Lycos 8.6 million registered users in Europe (S)

block.p: Lycos Europe said it would expand its presence to Scandinavia by buying the Swedish portal company Spray Network for $577 million in cash and stock. Lycos said Spray Network would give it 8.6 million registered users in Europe. The deal calls for Lycos Europe to issue 84.3 million shares to Spray Network's main shareholders, Spray Ventures and Investor A.B. Spray Ventures, in turn, will invest 100 million euros ($89.5 million) for another 10 million Lycos shares. Spray Ventures will hold 29.26 percent of the combined company.
